Best regards,
Alin Anca

Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> 於 2025年3月24日 週一 下午10:23寫道：

Hello Jay,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00435208. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00435208
Ticket Subject: About WOA Support
Ticket Details: Regarding EPP support for Arm PC (WOA), when will the test be available? Customers don't need to see it 100% complete, they just need to make sure it's usable.
Another small question, the search function of the online version of the manual is not easy to use. Do you still have a PDF version?

Thank you!

Alin Anca
Technical Support Engineer

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com
